text: 1.28: Ef 4.13; 5.27Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza Kraisan buna vhuueŋ bun za kha gumgi ga nzuai. Nza ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ zɨn vuav, nza mba bunen mbe nzuav mbe khɨvav, kama havharara mbe nzuai. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, nza khueŋ vuzvugi, mbe guigira khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi kɨrga, nza mben kov, Fhe Bakɨme han ŋgɨrga.
